Uses of Interface
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app.SmartCommands.GuardedHandler

  • Packages that use SmartCommands.GuardedHandler 
    Package Description
    com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app
    Contains all the Activity basis classes, an Android Application class, and some classes useful to activities.

    • Uses of SmartCommands.GuardedHandler in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app

      Classes in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app that implement SmartCommands.GuardedHandler 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SmartCommands.AbstractSimpleGuardedCommand<ContextClass extends android.content.Context>
      A handy SmartCommands.GuardedCommand which will issue systematically a log when an exception occurs during the command execution, and will trigger a SmartCommands.GuardedException which wraps the original exception in that case.
      static class  SmartCommands.DialogGuardedCommand
      A handy SmartCommands.SimpleGuardedCommand which will issue systematically dismiss a Dialog once the command execution is over.
      static class  SmartCommands.GuardedCommand<ContextClass extends android.content.Context>
      A Runnable used as command, which is allowed to throw an exception during its execution.
      static class  SmartCommands.ProgressGuardedCommand
      Enables to execute in background a task, by notifying when the execution is running.
      static class  SmartCommands.SimpleGuardedCommand
      A handy SmartCommands.AbstractSimpleGuardedCommand dedicated to activities.
      Methods in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app that return SmartCommands.GuardedHandler 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected SmartCommands.GuardedHandler SmartCommands.GuardedCommand.getDelegate() 
      Methods in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app with parameters of type SmartCommands.GuardedHandler 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SmartCommands.GuardedCommand<ContextClass> SmartCommands.GuardedCommand.setDelegate(SmartCommands.GuardedHandler delegate)
      Sets the delegate that will be used in case of exception thrown during the command execution.
      Constructors in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app with parameters of type SmartCommands.GuardedHandler 
      Constructor and Description
      SmartCommands.GuardedCommand(ContextClass context, java.lang.Object component, SmartCommands.GuardedHandler delegate)
      Creates a command that may be executed through the SmartCommands.execute(SmartCommands.GuardedCommand) method, and which is able to tune any thrown exception during its execution.
      SmartCommands.GuardedCommand(ContextClass context, SmartCommands.GuardedHandler delegate)
      Equivalent to calling SmartCommands.GuardedCommand#GuardedCommand(Context, Object, SmartCommands.GuardedHandler) with the second argument being null.
